metadata.title: CVE-2022-28190 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS-preview 22.04 LTS (jammy) - medium
metadata.description: NVIDIA GPU Display Driver for Windows contains a vulnerability in thekernel mode layer (nvlddmkm.sys) handler for DxgkDdiEscape, where improperinput validation can cause denial of service.
